page.title: Submit Station
page.description: Submit a new BTS station or add cells to an existing one. Your submission will be reviewed by moderators.

stationSelector.title: Select Station
stationSelector.searchPlaceholder: Search by station ID or address...
stationSelector.newStationHint: Fill in the station details and location below.
stationSelector.deleteStationHint: Search for the station you want to mark for deletion.

newStation.title: Station Details
newStation.stationIdHint: Unique identifier for the station (usually operator prefix + number)

ratSelector.title: Radio Technologies
ratSelector.description: Select the radio access technologies (RAT) available at this station.
ratSelector.noSelection: Select at least one technology to add cells.
ratSelector.iotHint: IoT cells can be marked in LTE & NR tables as NB-IoT & RedCap respectively.

cellDetails.noCells: No cells added. Click "Add Cell" to add a new cell.

form.submitSuccess: Your submission has been received and will be reviewed.
form.selectStationFirst: Select or create a station first
form.submitterNotePlaceholder: Add a note explaining your changes (optional)...

deleteStation.title: Delete Station
deleteStation.warning: This will mark the station for deletion. A moderator will review your request.
deleteStation.reasonPlaceholder: Why should this station be removed?

validation.stationIdTooShort: Station ID must be at least 2 characters
